column4: anyone else seeing download problems from repositories ?..so far wine and blackdown java aren't fetching right (          blackdown failed at around 87%) and wanted to make sure its not just me ..??
You have no business downloading from blackdown. Blackdown java is in the Ubuntu repositories.
im not downloading from there..im doing all this from "add applications'....
Ah, that's good then :-)
See if you can try a different mirror site.
Also check if your disk is full.
disk has tons of room
use a diffferent mirror ?
Yep
sorry..my brother setup this thing on my computer last night..I dont know a  mirror from the one in my  bathroom
'sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list' and change the hostname for the mirror. What's in there now?
I have no idea what your talking about :(..maybe im asking for help in the wrong place..where shoud I go ?
Open a terminal. Type 'sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list'.
its asking for some password....im going to strange my brother when I see him today
That's supposed to happen. Enter your password.
ok that seems to be working...nothing is happening though..the cursor wont move
Not with the arrow keys?
hm
'nano' won't use the mouse.
oh
Now it'll have a few lines that start wuth 'deb'. Can you paste *one* of them?
I am so glad your trying to help me...but this is all rather confusing coming from windows ( brother insisted and so far its nice enough ..)...shouldnt 'add applications' just work  ?
yes, but if the server it's fetching the application from is not working right, there will be issues.
